textBox.richText: The Biometrics group was awarded the 2015 IET Biometrics Premium Best Paper Award for the paper: McCool, C., Wallace, R., McLaren, M., El Shafey, L., Marcel, S.: ‘Session variability modelling for face authentication’, IET Biometrics, 2013, 2, (3), pp. 117–129 Congratulations to Chris, Roy, Mitch and Laurent ! Each year the IET awards a prize to the authors of the best paper published within the last two years in each of the IET’s journals. http://www.theiet.org/resources/journals/premium-awards.cfm
2015 IET Biometrics Premium Best Paper Award
